annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Aug. 17, 1991, D.C. Law 9-19, title I, § 101(f), 38 DCR 4066

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 2(m) of General Public Assistance Program Termination Temporary Amendment Act of 1997 (D.C. Law 12-21, September 23, 1997, law notification 44 DCR 5760).
For temporary (225 day) repeal of section, see § 701(m) of Fiscal Year 1998 Revised Budget Support Temporary Act of 1997 (D.C. Law 12-59, March 20, 1998, law notification 45 DCR 2094).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Application of Law 12-60: Section 2002 of D.C. Law 12-60 provided that the act shall apply as of October 1, 1997.
